hints.content: So on the number line, we start at $13$ and move **right** $\purpleD{80}$ and then $\maroonD7$ more.

This number line shows $13 + 87$:

![A number line starts at 13 with plus 80 and goes to 93. From 93 plus 7 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2a91795cf68e6ca289d4595c53edc09c125558ab)

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 13 with plus 80 and goes to 93. From 93 plus 7 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2a91795cf68e6ca289d4595c53edc09c125558ab)
![A number line starts at 13 with plus 8 and goes to 21. From 21 plus 7 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6e173ed7fb5f41ccf9f007ea77684b4d5710c56a)
![A number line starts at 13 with plus 70 and goes to 83. From 83 plus 8 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1c16cc0892393eb7e19005223295dc196047af51)
